headline: Morgan Stanley Reaffirms ‘Buy’ Rating on Intuit Inc. (INTU) Amid Strong Earnings Outlook
summary: With strong revenue growth and significant hedge fund interest, Intuit Inc. (NASDAQ:INTU) secures a spot on our list of the 14 Best IT Stocks to Buy for the Long Term. On August 18, 2025, Morgan Stanley reaffirmed its ‘Buy’ rating on Intuit Inc. (NASDAQ:INTU) with a $900 price target. This bullish stance remains despite an […]
